original: According to industry analysts, semiconductor stocks are set for a comeback as double-digit growth returns. After a slump earlier this year, semiconductor companies have shown strong gains in Q3, with stocks like NVIDIA and Intel seeing huge jumps. This growth is expected to continue into the end of the year, with high demand for electronics driving sales. Analysts also point to the increased use
